entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILC: redundant warnings for annotation mismatch on static DIM #104702
  • Misleading error message when trying to deserialize JSON into a collection property without a getter #104700
    Future
  • HTTP/3 Test Failure: SocketsHttpHandler_DiagnosticsTest_Http3.SendAsync_ExpectedDiagnosticCancelledLogging #104699
    9.0.0
  • Remove lightup approach for newer [InterceptorAttribute] feature; need to know compiler version #104693
    9.0.0
  • Add `JsonElement.GetPropertyCount()` #104692
    10.0.0
  • X509Chain Gap on Linux #104690
    Future
  • [Linker][Tests] HttpClientTests fails with System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: The SSL connection could not be established #104682
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient ignores 413 error response #104678
  • Faulting module name: coreclr.dll, version: 6.0.3224.31407 #104675
  • Intermittent errors building CoreCLR on Windows ARM #104674
    9.0.0
  • GC/Regressions/v2.0-beta2/452950 test failure #104671
  • BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow times out #104670
  • [API Proposal]: Add TagList overload to ActivityEvent API #104667
  • JIT: Loop alignment does not kick in for a tight "sum" loop #104665
  • LoongArch64: Track the progress of nativeaot test cases passing on LoongArch64. #104661
    Future
  • JIT: Unnecessary prolog frame setup in .NET 9 #104658
  • for loop performance regression #104655
  • Make TimeProviderTaskExtensions WaitAsync run continuations synchronously like Delay #104654
    Future

Closed

  • Add JsonElement.ValueSpan #77666
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 23 Regressions on 6/22/2024 6:46:45 PM #103974
  • read mem.stat.hierarchical_memory_limit when looking for the memory limit #83563
    9.0.0
  • baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester fails on Linux #46175
    9.0.0
  • Unable to add a Certificate in ClientCertificates from HttpClientHandler/SocketsHttpHandler #78933
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator should move to GetInterceptableLocation API #101079
    9.0.0
  • [HttpStress] `H3_FRAME_ERROR` in Post Duplex Slow #102880
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Support copying arrays of compatible pointers #104197
    9.0.0
  • Do unloadability memory leak testing on a larger subset of the CoreCLR tests #11160
    Future
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_89834/test89834/test89834.cmd #104057
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Json has transitive dependency on vulnerable System.Text.Json #104669
    8.0.x
  • Can an application structure based on WPF and the Prism framework using IoC be compiled using AOT? #104660
  • System.Net.Dns.RunAsync() does not decrement telemetry for canceled requests #92045
    9.0.0
  • JIT does not eliminate bounds check with 64-bit indexed loop #104659
    10.0.0
  • Null check at runtime by default + optional disabling #104656
  • `FileSystemWatcher` does not work when there is more than 1 instance of it #98424
    Future
  • Runtime Crash (SIGSEGV) on iOS #98410
    9.0.0
  • 200kB size delta for minimal NativeAOT shared lib with reflection disabled mode #91518
    Future
  • Proposal: expose <IlcFoldIdenticalMethodBodies> as a supported option #88748
    Future
  • Add bucket size hints to histograms #104137
    9.0.0
  • Support x86 for NativeAOT #86573
    Future
  • Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() needs IL2026-like warning for Native AOT (and self contained) builds #94200
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics - API surface confusion for TagList / ActivityTagsCollection #104607
    Future
  • HttpStress, HTTP/3: content mismatch in POST Duplex Slow #76183
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] H3_FRAME_UNEXPECTED in stress tests #87559
    9.0.0
  • [HttpStress] `H3_REQUEST_INCOMPLETE` on Linux #99959
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] [HttpStress] QuicException: Stream aborted by peer (258) in `(POST Duplex | PUT) Slow` #100534
    9.0.0
  • Add PublishAot flag gives package restore error using global.json #100929
  • Test failure: SslStream_RandomSizeWrites_OK #104650
    8.0.x
  • [libraries-jitstress] `System.Tests.UInt128Tests_GenericMath.TryReadLittleEndianUInt64Test` fails in CI #104613
    9.0.0
  • superpmi-replay failing with `Assertion failed 'emitCurIG != emitPrologIG'` #104570
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • ILLink: Fix order dependent logic for DAM on types #104701
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Ensure mono wasm jiterpreter handles v128_bitcast #104698
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricMultiplyAddCoefficient` #104697
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Update SDK to preview 6 #104696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use ARM64 tools when building on ARM64 hosts #104695
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Fix a few memory leaks #104691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable (No)ClientCert_DefaultValue_ResumeSucceeds only on Ubuntu 18 ARM #104689
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Refine post-dominance check in strength reduction #104687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext tests #104686
    needs-area-label
  • Update downlevel Versions.props #104685
    needs-area-label
  • [Wasi] switch to preview 2 #104683
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricSelectCoefficient`, `TrigonometricStartingValue` #104681
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • JIT: Prove some cases where strength reducing to GC pointers is ok #104679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.ToString for large decimal string #104676
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Update feature switch doc for WinForms feature switches #104673
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Intrinsify ExchangeObject/CompareExchangeObject for value = null #104668
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid an allocation in BigInteger.Parse("-2147483648") #104666
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104662
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NativeAOT] When reconciling shadow stack after catch, look for RhpThrowHwEx2 as well. #104652
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Add `JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8Value` #104595
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Add Avx512 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher (#103710)" #104688
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Use new [Interceptable] ctor for source gen #104180
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Limit the size of OID supported by AsnDecoder/AsnReader #104645
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix an issue with complex number parsing #104499
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.8
  • [mono] Support copying arrays of compatible pointers #104611
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add TensorPrimitives.{Max/Min}MagnitudeNumber #104651
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasi] sdk22 path #104379
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Update SYSLIB0026 with new message #104609
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Add SYSLIB0056 to list of diagnostics #104005
    needs-area-label
  • In Dns.RunAsync calls AfterResolution when canceled #104435
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Improve early returns for HashSet SubSet and SetEquals methods #102758
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add bucket bound hints to Networking histograms #104629
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Amend the nativeaot for LoongArch64. #104653
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add a fallback to filling buffers in DeserializeAsyncEnumerable. #104635
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `CallArg::m_tmpNum` #104429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only build applicable build Tasks when building the repo #104226
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for Sve.Scatter() #104555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [browser][MT] troubleshooting deadlocks 2 #104615
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update natvis to show VNs #104485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip switch recognition for handles #104634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disallow implicit byref args and return buffers from aliasing #104616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Account for mixed-enregistered locals when zeroing without block-init #104593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Use GetTempPath2 on Windows if available #104642
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Use `GetArrayDataReference` in `Vector*` #104532
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Expose `JsonElement.DeepEquals` #104579
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Throw InvalidOperationException on RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer() for generic methods #104644
    area-System.Reflection, 9.0.0
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Enhancing the SqlDbType with Json #103985
    area-System.Data
  • Enable DiagnosticsTest for HTTP3 #104641
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Straighten out flow during early jump threading #104603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `FloatingPointExponentialAccelerator` #104649
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Provide fix for #81093 - "Mono does not emit ProcessExit event on SIGTERM" #100056
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Make `ObjectFactory<T>` covariant #102553
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2492353 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • illumos: set default timezone info path #104533
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Fix frame boundary detection in SslStream #104606
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add NET 8.0 target to Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package #104648
    area-System.Buffers
  • [Apple-Mobile][Globalization] Refactoring of CalendarData.iOS and new DateTimeFormatInfo* tests #102464
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Do more DSA parameter sanity checking up front #104646
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 + wasi:http #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update PackageOverrides.txt #104638
    area-Setup
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [Mono] [swift-interop] Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Link native shared libraries with 16k page alignment #104577
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix various asserts that were found by Antigen #104625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddSequentialAcross` #104640
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fix cancelability of DNS queries #104420
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Integrate SimdUnicode for AVX-512 #104199
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Copy prop equivalent phis #104458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] DotnetJS exception on marshalled c#-objects finalizer call #2625

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] DotnetJS Minor incompatibilities with WASM SDK on Mono runtime #2627

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add missing export for ReleaseJSOwnedObjectByGCHandle #2630
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Address analyzer and generator torn state with Visual Studio #42087
  • dotnet nuget -h|--help doesn't display why #42084
  • SDK support for C++/CLI #42078
  • build error with nuget audit #42073
  • Add E2E tests for testing library mode builds for mobile #42064
    Backlog
  • dotnet-runtime-deps-8.0.7 missing in Fedora 40 & RHEL repo #42063

Closed

  • Add default values for WinForms trimming #41122

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix double build of test packages for Helix #42083
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42082
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update scancode to 32.2.1 #42079
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to MAUI .NET 9 Preview 6 manifests #42077
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #42075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #42074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix test for Multi-Target workloads #42062
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Attempt to fix Publish60Hosted_Works test #42061
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .editorconfig template with new defaults #42059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #42076
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42066
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add NuGet patch to fix obsolete warnings #42065
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WinForms trim value default tests #42034
    Area-ILLink
  • Add certificate content type checking to Signature.cs #42025
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Moved src/Assets to test/TestAssets #41924
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2492373 #41887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • stabilize branding for release #42053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in torn builds #41951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Disable templating tests on windows to unblock PR builds" #42051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add RazorLangVersion 9 #40348
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TestWorkspaceDiagnosticsWaitsForLspTextChangesWithMultipleSources failed in CI #74342
  • null flow error where bang operator does not bypass null error #74333
  • Avoid recommending get-only properties without valid settable options in object initializer #74331
  • Avoid recommending synthesizing record parameters in static context within the record #74327
  • TypedConstant.ToCSharpString/ToVisualBasicString should exclude bitwise or value of 0 #74326
  • Ref safety error with enumerators #74325
    17.12

Closed

  • Remove compat workaround for interceptors file path lookup. #72265
    17.12
  • Building a .NET 7 RC1 Project with VS Causing CS8032 #64243
  • Simple switch vs ternary: should IL code be the same? #70886
  • Support XAML LSP in vscode #69471
    18.0
  • Unexpected behavior when using ref structs in foreach loop #73741
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35109.94 #74324

PullRequests

Created

  • Tests to verify ref safety bug fix #74341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove 'open file only' concept from analyzer driver #74340
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Do not use memory mapped files on non-windows #74339
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add a ParamCollection test which uses the attribute included in .NET 9 SDK #74338
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always check get method parameters in override indexer #74337
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks and providers (4) #74336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge Internal/release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.8 #74335
  • Handle missing System.Nullable type #74330
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK #74329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge Internal/release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.10 #74334
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority, Next
  • Fixed grammar in incremental-generators.cookbook.md #74279
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove fallbacks (2) #74319
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix modification of readonly locals through ref fields #74255
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid more large string constant fields #74307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move determination of language for an LSP request into the serialized queue to avoid race #74300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix typos in Roslyn-Overview.md #74059
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion (#73844)" #74302
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disable saving source texts to memory mapped files on non-Windows platforms #73628
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [WIP] Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks (3) #74323
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix layering of Implement-Interface code-fixer vs language service #74320
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Switch implicit span to conversion from type #74232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Work around MSBuild task ordering bug #74205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Note that toolset package layout is hard-coded in SDK #74301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi v9.0.0-preview.6.24328.4 is generating schemas for primitive types #56735
  • Hard to debug role-based authorization failures #56734
  • ServerAuthenticationStateProvider.SetAuthenticationState() throws an exception #56733
  • NavigationManager.NavigateToLogout() stuck on authentication/logout-callback #56732
  • BuildServiceProviderAnalyzer: Detect BuildServiceProvider Calls in Extension Methods for IServiceCollection #56731
  • Fixes to generated schemas for some primitive types #56730
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #56729
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #56728
  • Regression: HTTP 401 using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 8.0.7 #56727
  • Update PackageOverrides.txt for latest packages #56724
  • [Component Vulnerability]please consider to upgrade ws in @microsoft/signalr from @^7.4.5 to @^7.5.10 #56723
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ModelBinding.QueryStringValueProviderFactory.CreateValueProviderAsync #56722
  • Signing during test project builds #56721
  • Perf regression: single_query #56718
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_spring, plaintext_spring #56717
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_spring, json_spring, json_spring #56716
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext_spring, plainTextEmptyFilter #56715
  • Returning TypedResult.Redirect become EmptyHttpResult #56714
  • OpenAPI Vs Swashbuckle #56711
  • DictionaryModelBinder not working with null default value in .Net 7 #56710

Closed

  • .NET 9 OpenAPI doesn't seem to export schemas (e.g. types) #56586
  • Servers not emitted in OpenAPI document #56188
  • HybridCache.RemoveAsync calls RemoveByTagAsync instead of RemoveAsync #56581
  • Quarantine GracefulTurnsAbortiveIfRequestsDoNotFinish #39986
    Test failures
  • [Blazor Webapp] Handling browser close/reload in server and wasm mode #56683
  • PageTitle component added in BuildRenderTree do not update the "title". #56708
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56698
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #56697

PullRequests

Created

  • Update jquery.validate to 1.20.1 #56726
    area-mvc
  • [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56725
    area-mvc
  • Improve endpoint extension method docs #56713
    area-networking
  • Apply schema transformers on properties and other subschemas #56709
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Don't require AttributeProvider for JsonPropertyInfo-based modifications #56712
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • Set OpenApiServers object in document #56470
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • Revert "Quarantine flaky MVC functional tests (#55935)" #56615
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview7
  • [release/6.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56273
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.33
  • Port "Lock around Http3Stream data frame processing" to `main` #56705
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • HybridCache - fix RemoveKeyAsync incorrectly calling RemoveByTagAsync #56719
    needs-area-label, 9.0-preview7
  • Add requirements comment to update-npm-dependencies #56670
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Renable GracefulTurnsAbortiveIfRequestsDoNotFinish #56720
    9.0-preview7
  • Use pattern matching #56532
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    area-networking
  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking
  • Look up trusted certs consistently on windows #56701
    area-commandlinetools
  • Port "Add direct references to S.T.J. in tools" to `main` #56704
    area-commandlinetools
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message & Helper Class #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `34ad51b` #56545
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • AddConnections: AddRouting -> AddRoutingCore #56703
    area-signalr
  • Remove LINQ usage from OpenAPI comparers #56599
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Type binding Error with .NET 9 Preview 6 #23551
    9.0-preview7
  • Can not launch app after adding Entitlements.plist for MacCataylst #23548
  • UnauthorizedAccessExceptions are getting raised when building a blank MAUI app when using .NET 9.0 #23546
  • Adding aps-environment on Entitlement.plist causes Provisioning profile issues #23542
  • CarouselView ItemsSource not updated when triggered via button click #23538
    Backlog
  • [Memory leak] Critical MAUI memory leak in transient views #23537
  • ArgumentException in Preferences.Get #23536
  • [Binding SG] It is not possible to use private fields and properties in SetBinding<TSource, TProperty> #23535
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Binding SG] It is not possible to use private types in SetBinding<TSource, TProperty> #23534
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Binding SG] BindingSourceGen generates invalid code when referencing fields generated by XamlG #23531
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [MAUI]I7_PullToRefresh-Pulling down to refresh using refreshview for Horizontal grid doesn't work. #23529
    .NET 8 SR8
  • [Unstable][MAUI]I9_Scrolling_SnapPoints page throws System.ObjectDisposedException after setting SnapPointsType. #23528
    Backlog
  • cannot disable animation when navigate back #23524
  • [Properties > Build Actions] options available depend on order of TargetFrameworks in .csproj - Cannot see all options at once - Only the first OS's options are shown #23523
  • Hot Reload - Changes not supported #23521

Closed

  • Scrollview iOS - size out of bounds, sizing does not work. #23530
  • CarouselView Position-- not working on Windows #23533
  • CarouselView not getting displayed properly with ContentPresenter and ContentView #23539
  • Memory leaks when replacing Application.Current.MainPage by a new one keep the old page in memory #23034
  • Debug app crashes on iPhone 8 when running it directly, not debugging it. #23499
  • Sqlite Upgradation loss the DB while migrating from .Net7 to .Net8 MAUI only for Android #23525
  • [MAUI][.NET9] Clicking on any recipe page shows blank #21032
  • Assets file '... QueryEngine\obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net7.0'. #23368
  • Carousel on MAUI .NET Application Not working. #23020
  • [Only Windows] InputTransparent=True makes view transparent #23436
    Backlog
  • Calling Focus() on an Entry befor it has been displayed causes ClearButton to be displayed permanently #23112
    Backlog
  • unable to debug android apps on Linux #23472
  • Support navigating to a new shell via NavigationPage #23356

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove mobile test from running on desktop #23550
  • [Windows] Fix pull to refresh w/ horz item layouts #23547
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-general
  • [net9.0] Update to preview7 versions #23544
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix the batch file for running local dotnet on windows #23541
  • [windows] fix memory leak in WebView #23540
    platform/windows 🪟, memory-leak 💦
  • [net9.0] Revert "Revert "Internalize MessagingCenter (#12582)"" #23527
  • [Windows] ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #23526

Merged

  • [windows] fix VisualDiagnosticsOverlay keeping Page's alive #23489
    platform/windows 🪟, memory-leak 💦
  • [net9.0] Update versions preview6 (#23520) #23532
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Update versions preview6 public #23520
  • Support the new RIDs on WinUI #23247
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨, area-controls-entry

Updated

  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • Don't throw exceptions on back-to-back window deactivations #23519
    platform/windows 🪟
  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fix iOS log exports #23334
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Subscribe pointer events only when needed #23515
    community ✨
  • Fix navigation stuck on iOS when pushing on hidden tab section in TabBar #22574
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.3.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Do not solely make Visual Diagnostics available on debugger being attached #23490
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Generate the Android 7 round app icon #23276
    area-single-project
  • [Android] [iOS] [macOS] ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #23513
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ef cache vs Redis #34204
  • Generating new ModelSnapshot removes type and name for HasDiscriminator leading to null reference exception in 8.0.7 #34201
  • Option to store temporary keys in the object fields, to support relations without navigation properties #34200
  • AutoInclude() for self-referencing entities. Resolving cycles. #34198
    Backlog

Closed

  • Projections with branching causes sub-fields to not load properly #34205
  • Multiple iteration ".Include()" to simplify complex query / improve performance #34203

PullRequests

Created

  • Add extension point to Migrate #34199

Updated

  • Lock the database while executing Migrate() #34115
    providers-beware
  • Add SqlServer DATEPART support for Microsecond and Nanosecond properties. #34135
